notes.text: This advisory aggregates security fixes for the kernel SRPM in CIQ FIPS Compliant for Rocky Linux 8. It addresses 13 CVEs: CVE-2022-4744, CVE-2022-49803, CVE-2022-49846, CVE-2022-49910, CVE-2022-49921, and 8 more.
notes.title: Description

document.title: kernel security update for CIQ FIPS Compliant for Rocky Linux 8

branches.name: CIQ FIPS Compliant for Rocky Linux 8
